message: It would be cool if you could make your [org].github.com site powered by a GitHub Wiki. It would probably make sense to make the `[org].github.com` project's wiki into this linked thing.
The site could have a default template for displaying the wiki pages without the GitHub chrome.
One could envision the same thing for [org].github.com/project being powered by that project's wiki.
This could, among other things, make a project's canonical documentation more accessible.
I toyed with this idea a few months ago, and even went so far as to write this functionality into a Gollum branch
But I couldn't come up with a simple way for a user to configure it
You can of course do this yourself.  Wiki.basho.org is built from a Gollum wiki
